name: Muffin Man
description:
A game by Pixelated Hammered Raccoon!

Evanski, Pixel-Team, Kenneth Burkhart of Firehammer Games

For the GMC JAM 45

Do you know the Muffin Man better than you know yourself?

You better, because he's YOU!

Stop the people of the town from trying to take your muffins by force!

Collect tips! Sling Muffins! Get that damn raccoon to stop eating them!

Can you get the High-score?
